sqlquery.name: SQL_projectCleftGrafting_item
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ c1 as BaseID, c700000011 as BaseSummary, c700000014 as BaseItems, c800020014 as RelatedBaseItems, c800020004 as BaseChief, c800020005 as BaseConnection, c800020006 as BaseProGJRange, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c700000017 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as BaseAcceptOutTime, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020013 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as PlanToFinishTime, case when c800052001=0 then '是' when c800052001=1 then '否' end as QualityResult, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020007 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as BaseActualStartTime, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020012 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as BaseActualFinishTime, case when c800020011=0 then '否' when c800020011=1 then '是' end as BaseIsSuccess /*COUNT*/ from {WF:EL_LCT_Math} where 1=1 and (c700000010<>'草稿' and c700000010<>'已作废') #con_search# #createtime# #tomtime# #orderby#

sqlquery.name: SQL_projectCleftGrafting_jituan
sqlquery.select: select '' as 省份, '' as 割接类型, c700000011 as 网元名称, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c700000017 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-MI') as 割接开始时间, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020013 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-MI') as 割接结束时间, c800020006 as 影响情况 from {WF:EL_LCT_Math} where 1=1 and (c700000010<>'草稿' and c700000010<>'已作废') #con_search# #createtime# #tomtime# #orderby# --order by c700000017 desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_projectCleftGrafting_yuebao
sqlquery.select:
select
c700000011 as 主题, c700000014 as 割接网元, c800020014 as 关联告警网元, c800020004 as 割接负责人, c800020005 as 联系方式, c800020006 as 工程割接影响范围, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c700000017 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as 计划开始时间, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020013 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as 计划完成时间, case when c800052001=0 then '是' when c800052001=1 then '否' end as 质检是否合格, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020007 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as 实际开始时间, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + c800020012 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') as 实际完成时间, case when c800020011=0 then '否' when c800020011=1 then '是' end as 割接是否成功, exportbytimedecide(c800020007,c700000007,c700000006) as 工单派发是否及时
from {WF:EL_LCT_Math} where 1=1 and (c700000010<>'草稿' and c700000010<>'已作废') #con_search# #createtime# #tomtime# #orderby#
